revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokémon Village |image = [[File:Pokémon Village.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Pokémon Village. |tokens = 725,000 |location = West of Route 20. }} '''Pokémon Village''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 9,003,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Jigglypuff.png|40px]] Jigglypuff || rowspan=6 colspan=2|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl |- | [[File:Noctowl.png|40px]] Noctowl |- | [[File:Lombre.png|40px]] Lombre |- | [[File:Gothorita.png|40px]] Gothorita |- | [[File:Amoonguss.png|40px]] Amoonguss |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Ditto.png|40px]] Ditto || <center> 94,836,530 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Zoroark.png|40px]] Zoroark || <center> 95,743,340 |}
